data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The most powerful rocket ever built was the Saturn V which was used to power a man to the moon. But ____ most ____ rocket ____ ever ____ is ____ space shuttle's rocket ____. ( ____ Saturn V was ____ powerful ____ it ____ five ____ instead ____ the ____ used ____ the ____. ) The shuttle boosters are fueled by a solid fuel mixture that is mainly aluminium and ammonium perchlorate.
data.partBlankContent: The most powerful rocket ever built was the Saturn V which was used to power a man to the moon. But t__ most powe____ rocket eng___ ever bu___ is t__ space shuttle's rocket boo____. ( T__ Saturn V was mo__ powerful bec____ it us__ five eng____ instead o_ the t__ used b_ the shu____. ) The shuttle boosters are fueled by a solid fuel mixture that is mainly aluminium and ammonium perchlorate.
data.fullContent: The most powerful rocket ever built was the Saturn V which was used to power a man to the moon. But the most powerful rocket engine ever built is the space shuttle's rocket booster. ( The Saturn V was more powerful because it used five engines instead of the two used by the shuttle. ) The shuttle boosters are fueled by a solid fuel mixture that is mainly aluminium and ammonium perchlorate.
data.answer: 有史以来建造的最强大的火箭是土星五号，它被用来驱动人类登上月球。但迄今为止最强大的火箭发动机是航天飞机的火箭助推器。(土星五号更强大，因为它使用了五个引擎，而不是航天飞机使用的两个。)航天飞机助推器的燃料是一种固体燃料混合物，主要是铝和高氯酸铵。
